medium: Pen and brown ink and brown wash over black chalk on faded blue-green paper
provenance: From the Sagredo-Borghese Album, Doge Nicolò Sagredo, Venice (by c. 1651); his brother, Stefano Sagredo, Venice; his son, Zaccaria Sagredo, Venice; his nephew, Gherardo Sagredo, Venice (until d. 1738); his wife, Cecilia Grimani Calergi Sagredo (until c. 1743); private collection, Lyon (until c. 1919; dispersed album and sold at auction in Lyon); [Luca Baroni, New York, until 2003; sold in May for $13, 000, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (2003-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Two Studies of the Bound Christ (recto); Study of the Bound Christ (verso)
